channel.title: Adding Monsters and drops
channel.description: How do I add A monster to Varrock square(For example) I have the cords and stuff. How DO I add that monster to spawn there,and how do i add more than 1? I also wanna add drops Here is what I want if someone can give me the premade codes Abbysal Demon-Drops: ashes whip and thats all i need all help appreciated. Also if you can make whip a rare drop. All help appreciated!
